verses.roman:
vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ
pradyumnaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam
aniruddha iti brahman
mūrti-vyūho 'bhidhīyate

synonyms: vāsudevaḥ saṅkarṣaṇaḥ pradyumnaḥ—Vāsudeva, Saṅkarṣaṇa and Pradyumna; puruṣaḥ—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; svayam—Himself; aniruddhaḥ—Aniruddha; iti—thus; brahman—O brāhmaṇa, Śaunaka; mūrti-vyūhaḥ—the expansion of personal forms; abhidhīyate—is designated.
translation: Vāsudeva, Saṅkarṣaṇa, Pradyumna and Aniruddha are the names of the direct personal expansions of the Supreme Godhead, O brāhmaṇa Śaunaka.
